data.Name: Texture Like Sun
data.Bio: from website: http://blanktape.com.au/artists/ It probably doesn’t sound like a compliment to say that a song sounds like an argument, but in the case of ‘Bottle’ from Melbourne’s Texture Like Sun, it’s an oddly apt description and far from a slur. An elegant meditation on the games we play with ourselves through the course of addiction, whether it be to alcohol, drugs or love, the internal arguments are universal.With each line comes another layer of sound Read more on Last.fm
